MePassword is a free and open-source password management extension designed to deliver top-notch security, ease of use, and complete control over your credentials. Built with advanced encryption and robust security features, MePassword ensures your data remains private and accessible only to you.

Key Features
Unmatched Security with Zero-Knowledge Architecture
Zero-Knowledge Architecture: Your passwords are encrypted and can only be decrypted locally within the extension, ensuring only you have access.
End-to-End Encryption: Protects your sensitive data at every step.
AES-GCM Encryption: Provides advanced protection for stored passwords.
RSA Key Pair Generation: Enables secure communication for password sharing.
Private Key Storage: Keys, including your private RSA key and AES encryption keys, are securely stored on your Windows system instead of the browser, offering enhanced security against potential browser vulnerabilities.
Biometric Authentication: Supports Windows Hello face ID and fingerprint.
Session Management: Auto-lock functionality and session timeouts for added protection.
Effortless Password Management
Secure Storage: Safeguard all your passwords in one place.
Auto-Fill: Save time with automatic credential filling on websites.
Password Sharing: Share credentials securely with others.
Bulk Operations: Perform bulk actions like delete or share passwords.
Visibility Toggle: View passwords when needed with a simple toggle.
User-Friendly Features
Account Management: Register, log in, and manage your profile effortlessly.
Multi-Device Support: Sync and access your passwords across devices.
Backup & Restore: Create encrypted backups and restore your data anytime.
Search & Filter: Quickly find passwords with advanced filtering.
Customization & Settings
Auto-Lock Timing: Configure auto-lock from 30 seconds to 1 hour.
Session Duration: Customize session timeouts between 5 and 360 days.
Data Cleanup: Clear unused sessions or data automatically.
Backup Options: Export data securely in .mpb format.
Browser Integration
Chrome Compatibility: Designed specifically for seamless integration with Google Chrome.
Auto-Fill Content Scripts: Automatically fill credentials securely.
Why Choose MePassword?
Zero-Knowledge Architecture: No one but you can ever access your passwords, not even us.
Secure Key Storage: Private keys and AES encryption keys are stored securely on Windows rather than the browser, offering better protection from browser-based attacks.
Free and Open Source: Enjoy premium features without any cost.
Privacy First: Your data is encrypted end-to-end and can only be decrypted locally within the extension.
Convenience: Intuitive design and one-click access to passwords.
